mapper.sql: id, shop_id, name, type, condition_amount, discount_amount, discount_rate, total_count, remaining_count, per_limit, start_time, end_time, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM coupon WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND status = 1 AND start_time <= NOW() AND end_time >= NOW() AND remaining_count > 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon ( shop_id, name, type, condition_amount, discount_amount, discount_rate, total_count, remaining_count, per_limit, start_time, end_time, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{conditionAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{discountRate}, #{totalCount}, #{remainingCount}, #{perLimit}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE coupon SET remaining_count = remaining_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND remaining_count > 0
